content: Lokmoriyo korenaan - daivatthin puthrane- enna pole)

Sthephaanosin marana-tthe shodhichen
Ettam kashdatha avanettathi-naal nyaan vismithanaayu
Thanmel kallavar varshichu. Thaan praarththhichu.
Bodham vittavar cheythathu naa-thhaa nee orkkaruthe
/tantyamavarkkaayi praarththhicha
/tnaathhanu sannibhanee daasante
Yaachanayaal krpa eridunneesho kaattharullka.
